entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with ice pellets in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
